title: Fibromyalgia Online Community
author: WebMD Editorial Contributors

content: Living with fibromyalgia is as much about getting up-to-date information as it is about finding the right support. In WebMD's online community, you can chat with others living with fibromyalgia, get tips on dealing with everything from pain to sleep, and find a specialist who treats fibromyalgia in your area.

sections.heading: Fibromyalgia Support Group
content: Looking for a place to share your frustrations and get tips from others coping with the same condition?
Share your experiences with fibromyalgia and learn from others in WebMD's Message Board: Fibromyalgia Support Group

sections.heading: Find a Doctor Who Treats Fibromyalgia
content: Get a listing of rheumatologists in your area with WebMD's Physician Directory .
